text: Joel Stephen "Joey" Greco (born February 29, 1972) is an American television personality and actor. He was the host of the reality TV show Cheaters for ten seasons. Greco was born in Long Island, New York. His career began in 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Television personalities from New York (state) Category:Actors from New York (state)
title: Joey Greco
